TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SettingsAllowAnonymousAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 标识某个配置文件属性是否可由匿名用户设置或访问。

span.span: Identifies whether a profile property can be set or accessed for an anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于标识如果用户为匿名用户, 是否可以访问自定义配置文件实现的属性。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息, 请参阅为[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100))配置元素提供的文档。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the documentation provided for the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果没有为配置文件属性指定, 则不允许匿名访问配置文件属性。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access of the profile property is not allowed. 自定义配置文件实现是继承自抽象类的类, 它定义[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素中未指定的用户配置文件的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 可以在应用程序的 web.config 文件中使用`inherits` [配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素的属性指定自定义用户配置文件类型, 如下面的示例中所示。You can specify a custom user-profile type in the application's Web.config file with the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个继承自的类, 以创建自定义配置文件。The following code example defines a class that inherits from the to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型是在应用程序`inherits`的 web.config 文件的[配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))文件配置元素的属性中指定的。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，并指定是否允许匿名访问关联的配置文件属性。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class and specifies whether to allow anonymous access to the associated profile property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于标识如果用户为匿名用户, 是否可以访问自定义配置文件实现的属性。The class is used to identify whether a property of a custom profile implementation can be accessed if the user is an anonymous user. 有关启用匿名身份验证的信息, 请参阅[anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration 元素。For information about enabling anonymous identification, see the [anonymousIdentification](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/91ka2e6a(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 如果没有为配置文件属性指定, 则不允许匿名访问配置文件属性。If no is specified for a profile property, anonymous access to the profile property is not allowed. 自定义配置文件实现是继承自抽象类的类, 它定义[配置文件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))配置元素中未指定的用户配置文件的属性。A custom profile implementation is a class that inherits from the abstract class and defines properties for the user profile that are not specified in the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个继承自类的类, 以创建自定义配置文件。The following example defines a class that inherits from the class to create a custom profile. 自定义配置文件的类型是在应用程序`inherits`的 web.config 文件的[配置](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100))文件配置元素的属性中指定的。The type of the custom profile is specified in the `inherits` attribute of the [profile](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms164644(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element in the Web.config file for an application. 有关指定自定义配置文件实现的配置文件的示例, 请参阅类概述。For an example of a configuration file that specifies a custom profile implementation, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/CS/employeeprofile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase/VB/employeeprofile.vb#1)]
